item.title: 法国股市因信任投票计划推动欧洲股市下跌
item.description: 法国总理弗朗索瓦-贝鲁（Francois Bayrou）计划举行信任投票后，政治不确定性加剧，法国股市周二下跌。【原文：French stocks fell on Tuesday as political uncertainty ratcheted up following Prime Minister Francois Bayrou’s plan to call a confidence vote.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金因卡特彼勒与约旦河西岸有关联而将其列入黑名单
item.description: 挪威 2 万亿美元的主权财富基金将重型设备制造商卡特彼勒公司排除在外，理由是以色列使用卡特彼勒的推土机摧毁了巴勒斯坦人在加沙和约旦河西岸的财产。【原文：Norway’s $2 trillion sovereign wealth fund excluded heavy-equipment maker Caterpillar Inc. based on Israel’s use of its bulldozers to destroy Palestinian property in Gaza and the West Bank.】

item.title: 日本顶级新闻媒体起诉人工智能初创公司 Perplexity 侵犯版权
item.description: 日经新闻》（Nikkei Inc. 和《朝日新闻》（Asahi Shimbun Co.【原文：Nikkei Inc. and the Asahi Shimbun Co. sued artificial-intelligence startup Perplexity AI Inc. for copyright infringement, joining other news organizations in Japan and the US that are challenging the use of their content in AI tools.】

item.title: 研究称：人工智能使初级编码员更难找到工作
item.description: 最新研究显示，人工智能正在使美国的入门级工人更难在软件开发和客户服务等领域找到工作。【原文：Artificial intelligence is making it harder for entry-level workers in the US to find jobs in fields like software development and customer service, according to new research.】

item.title: 欧洲首次公开募股市场准备从关税动荡中反弹
item.description: 今年秋季，一批价值数十亿美元的企业可能会帮助欧洲首次公开募股市场卷土重来，弥补该地区十多年来最缓慢的上半年业绩。【原文：A group of multi-billion dollar businesses could help stage a comeback for Europe’s market for initial public offerings this fall, compensating for the region’s slowest first half in more than a decade.】

item.title: 2024 年非法网站将占据欧洲博彩和赌场销售额的 71
item.description: 去年，非法博彩运营商占据了欧洲在线博彩和赌场市场71%的份额，约合806.5亿欧元（约合938亿美元），监管机构在体育蓬勃发展的一年里努力遏制加密赌场、预测市场和无牌体育博彩公司。【原文：Illegal gambling operators captured 71% of Europe’s online betting and casino market last year, or €80.65 billion ($93.8 billion), as regulators struggled to rein in crypto casinos, prediction markets and unlicensed sportsbooks during a booming year for sports.】

item.title: 政治担忧加剧，法国资产连续第二日下跌
item.description: 由于法国总理弗朗索瓦-巴伊鲁决定对其政府进行信任投票，法国资产连续第二天遭到抛售。【原文：French assets sold off for a second day as Prime Minister Francois Bayrou’s decision to call a confidence vote in his own government continued to ripple through markets.】

item.title: 投资者将目光转向以太币，比特币逼近七周低点
item.description: 随着比特币从 8 月中旬创下的纪录进一步回落，比特币跌至近七周以来的最低水平。【原文：Bitcoin sank to its lowest level in nearly seven weeks as the token retreats further from a record set in mid-August.】

item.title: BAT 首席财务官 Soraya Benchikh 立即离职
item.description: 英美烟草公司（British American Tobacco Plc）首席财务官索拉娅-本奇克（Soraya Benchikh）在任职一年多之后，将立即卸任。【原文：British American Tobacco Plc’s chief financial officer, Soraya Benchikh, is stepping down with immediate effect after a little more than a year in the role.】

item.title: BNEF 称，特朗普政策导致美国可再生能源投资下降 36
item.description: 由于开发商对白宫针对可再生能源行业的政策调整做出了回应，今年美国对可再生能源项目的投资急剧下降。【原文：US investments in renewable energy projects plunged this year as developers responded to White House policy shifts targeting the sector.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑上涨，英国股市有望从纪录回落
Orsted 试图在出售 94 亿美元股票前安抚投资者情绪
item.description: 在特朗普政府决定叫停该公司在美国的两个风力发电项目之一后，Orsted A/S 公司高管计划周二向股东们作出保证，因为他们对该公司拟出售 94 亿美元股票的可行性提出了质疑。【原文：Orsted A/S executives plan to reassure shareholders Tuesday after the Trump administration’s decision to halt one of the company’s two wind-power projects in the US raised questions about the viability of its proposed $9.4 billion stock sale.】

item.title: 美国提高征税在即，印度将减少对俄罗斯石油的采购
item.description: 作为俄罗斯原油的最大买家之一，印度的炼油厂正计划在未来几周减少采购量，这是在美国提高关税前不到一天向华盛顿鹰派做出的适度让步，但同时也表明印度并不打算断绝与莫斯科的关系。【原文：Refiners in India, among the largest buyers of Russian crude, are planning to trim their purchases in the coming weeks, a modest concession to Washington’s hawks less than a day ahead of a hike in US tariffs, but also a signal that the country has no plans to sever ties with Moscow.】

item.title: 据说 TPG 支持的 SK Finance 将在需求疲软后搁置印度 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，TPG 公司支持的 SK Finance Ltd. 已搁置了在印度进行首次公开募股的计划，因为该公司未能吸引到足够的投资者需求。【原文：TPG Inc.-backed SK Finance Ltd. has shelved plans for an initial public offering in India after the company failed to draw enough investor demand for the deal to go ahead, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 政治危机引发法国债券大跌吸引日本买家
item.description: 一些日本投资者认为，法国政府垮台风险引发的法国债券大跌是一个买入机会。【原文：A French bond selloff driven by the risk of the government’s collapse is being seen by some Japanese investors as a buying opportunity.】

item.title: 莫迪利用特朗普关税削减印度税收和繁文缛节
item.description: 当印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪站在新德里 17 世纪红堡的城墙上宣布削减消费税时，他让自己的许多官员大吃一惊。【原文：When Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi stood on the ramparts of the 17th century Red Fort in New Delhi and announced a cut to consumption taxes, he took many of his own officials by surprise.】

item.title: 瑞典银行预计今年瑞典央行利率将降至 1.5%
item.description: 瑞典银行（Swedbank AB）的分析师表示，瑞典央行今年可能会将基准利率下调半个百分点，以启动延迟的经济复苏。【原文：The Swedish central bank will likely reduce its benchmark interest rate by half a percentage point this year to kick-start a delayed economic recovery, according to analysts at Swedbank AB who earlier saw one quarter-point cut before 2026.】

item.title: 日本计划收紧商务签证发放规则
item.description: 随着商务经理签证越来越受欢迎，日本移民局计划收紧发放商务经理签证的规定。【原文：Japan’s immigration agency plans to tighten the rules for granting business manager visas as the program has increased in popularity.】

item.title: 关税不确定性让欧洲企业面临艰难抉择
item.description:
欧盟与美国达成的贸易协议让欧洲企业在关税问题上有了一些明确的认识，但新常态仍难以预测且成本高昂

。【原文：

An EU-US trade deal gave businesses in Europe some clarity on tariffs, but the new normal is still unpredictable and expensive

】

item.title: 匈牙利将坚持谨慎的关键利率政策
item.description: 匈牙利央行将连续第 11 个月维持欧盟最高借贷成本，决策者将货币稳定放在首位，而不是过早放松货币政策的潜在风险。【原文：Hungary’s central bank is set to maintain the European Union’s highest borrowing cost for an 11th consecutive month, with policymakers prioritizing currency stability to the potential risk of premature monetary easing.】

item.title: 澳大利亚在线零售商首席执行官使用人工智能语音展示业绩
item.description: Kogan.com Ltd.创始人兼首席执行官鲁斯兰-科根（Ruslan Kogan）在周一的业绩发布会上介绍这家在线零售商的业绩时，决定使用人工智能生成的自己的声音。【原文：When Kogan.com Ltd. founder and Chief Executive Officer Ruslan Kogan presented the online retailer’s results at its briefing on Monday, he decided to use an AI-generated version of his voice.】

item.title: 中国半成品钢出口量激增 300% 以上
item.description: 今年迄今为止，中国的半成品钢材出口量翻了两番多，即使在贸易行动浪潮之后，这种金属也出现了前所未有的泛滥。【原文：China has more than quadrupled its exports of steel in semi-finished form so far this year, adding to an unprecedented flood of the metal even after a wave of trade actions.】

item.title: 法院顾问称，埃利奥特对 Citgo 的出价高于黄金储备公司的出价
item.description: 一位法庭指定的顾问称，在最新一轮收购 Citgo Petroleum Corp. 母公司的竞标中，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的关联公司安博能源（Amber Energy）提交的修改后的出价高于黄金储备公司（Gold Reserve）的出价。【原文：A court-appointed adviser said a revised bid filed by Amber Energy, an affiliate of Elliott Investment Management, topped Gold Reserve’s offer in the latest bidding round to purchase the parent company of Citgo Petroleum Corp.】

item.title: 特朗普试图解雇的美联储理事丽莎-库克是谁？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一晚些时候表示，他将因涉嫌抵押贷款欺诈而解雇美联储理事丽莎-库克。【原文：President Donald Trump late Monday said he would fire Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook for alleged mortgage fraud.】

item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 台湾掉期市场的降息赌注几乎消失殆尽
item.description: 台湾的利率掉期上升到了显示交易商正在减少货币宽松押注的水平，因为台湾经济正在抵御美国关税带来的逆风。【原文：Taiwan’s interest-rate swaps are rising to levels that show traders are reducing monetary easing bets, as the economy defies headwinds from US tariffs.】

item.title: 炙手可热的套利交易让香港珠宝商成为最大做空目标
item.description: 周大福珠宝集团有限公司自 2011 年上市以来的首次大规模融资，使这家香港珠宝商成为该市股价跌幅最大的股票之一。【原文：Chow Tai Fook Jewellery Group Ltd.’s first major fundraising since its 2011 listing has turned the Hong Kong jeweler into one of the city’s most-shorted stocks.】

item.title: Danantara 向 "爱国者 "投资者募集 31 亿美元债券
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，印尼新成立的主权财富基金已向投资者了解了一项计划，即以低于市场的收益率出售所谓的爱国债券，从而筹集50万亿印尼盾（约合31亿美元）。【原文：Indonesia’s newly established sovereign wealth fund has sounded out investors on a plan to raise 50 trillion rupiah ($3.1 billion) by selling so-called patriot bonds at below-market yields, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 受特朗普关税影响，日本暂停向美国运送部分包裹
item.description: 由于美国政府征收新的关税，日本邮政株式会社将暂停向美国运送一些小包裹，这表明美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的征税措施可能会对小型企业和个人产生影响。【原文：Japan Post Co. will suspend shipping of some small packages to the United States due to fresh tariffs imposed by the US government, in a sign of how President Donald Trump’s levies may impact smaller businesses and individuals.】
